function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 in office and factory premises","Impact":"Disruption of normal function and economic health","Mitigation":"Implement safety measures and protective barriers","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, contactless entry systems","People":"Office and factory workers","Owner":"Building owners, government agencies"},{"Description":"Vulnerabilities in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and air quality, implementing sanitation protocols","Technologies":"HVAC systems, UV-C germicidal lighting","People":"Office and factory workers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Vulnerabilities in the control environment","Impact":"Lack of control over disease spread within the workplace","Mitigation":"Enforcing hygiene protocols, providing PPE, promoting remote work","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, remote access control systems","People":"Office and factory workers","Owner":"Employers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Vulnerabilities in the regulatory environment","Impact":"Lack of clear guidelines for disease prevention","Mitigation":"Developing and enforcing workplace safety regulations, providing training and resources","Technologies":"Health monitoring software, compliance management systems","People":"Office and factory workers","Owner":"Government agencies, regulatory bodies"}]}
